portfolio.title: Personal Website
portfolio.description:
Project Goal:

  • Designed a sleek, modern, and intuitive e-commerce platform for fashion enthusiasts.
  • Focused on creating a visually engaging and seamless online shopping experience.

UI & Visual Design:

  • Minimal aesthetics with bold typography for a high-end look.
  • Dynamic product displays showcasing high-quality fashion imagery.
  • Personalized recommendation system for better user engagement.

UX Strategy:

  • Effortless navigation with clear category divisions and smart filters.
  • Smooth checkout flow with multiple payment options.
  • Responsive design ensuring seamless shopping across mobile & desktop.

Features & Interactions:

  • Quick View & Wishlist for a faster shopping experience.
  • Interactive animations for a premium feel.
  • Dark & Light mode support for accessibility.

Tools Used:

  • Figma – High-fidelity UI/UX prototyping.
  • Photoshop – Enhanced product visuals & branding.

portfolio.title: API Development
portfolio.description: Created scalable RESTful APIs for e-commerce platforms.
